bibl.title: Politics, Administration and Society in the Hellenistic and Roman World. Proceedings of the International Colloquium, Bertinoro 19-24 July 1997
bibl.note: Provisional list of all possible royal appearances in the chora, including the hieroglyphic texts (more than a hundred pieces of evidence, attesting between 40 and 50 royal trips, from Ptolemy II to Ptolemy XV).
bibl.seg: CLARYSSE Willy, The Ptolemies Visiting the Egyptian Chora.

Leon MOOREN (Ed.), Politics, Administration and Society in the Hellenistic and Roman World. Proceedings of the International Colloquium, Bertinoro 19-24 July 1997 = Studia Hellenistica. 36 (Leuven, 2000) pp. 29-53, 10 tabl.
